assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all relevant subjects included in this paper. Patients shown in this review article were recruited as part of a national ‘Genetics of Eye and Brain anomalies’ study, approved by the Cambridge East Ethics Committee (04/Q0104/129). Additional informed consent for all individuals for whom identifying information is included in this article.
